actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to provide that State and local governments may regulate aircraft noise.

summary.text: Provides that nothing in the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 shall preclude any State or political subdivision from adopting any law with respect to aircraft noise and sonic boom. States that compliance with any such State or political subdivision law shall not relieve any person from the obligation to comply with the provisions of the Federal Aviation Act. (Amends 49 U.S.C. 1431).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to provide that State and local governments may regulate aircraft noise.
